description.text: This Submodel template aims at interoperable provision of information describing a dataset and meta information about it in regard to the asset of the respective Asset Administration Shell.
Boundary conditions in which the dataset was created
Information about the datacollector (e.g. a sensor).
Reference to the data collector
Collection about environmental conditions the dataset was created with
Condition about the enviroment
Information, if the dataset is synthetic, real or mixed
Refernce to the Contact Information IDTA Submodel to describe the responsible person for the Submodel
Additional Information typical for labeled datasets
Information about labeled data for classification
Number of the different labels in the dataset
Every label as a property and the number of samples
Additional information about one label
Name of the class
Number of occurrences of the label in the dataset
Collection containing every dataset element individuallly
Collection for features and the annotatin file for a single dataset element
Name of the file
Collection containing all the labels within the dataset element
Number of labels in this dataset element
Example label, this property should be existing for every label with the labelname as value
Path to the dataset element
Annotation file with labeling information about the dataset element
Collection to add addtional information about the dataset element (e.g. speaker information for audio data)
additional information about the dataset element
Balance between the classes
Annotation file of the dataset (e.g. CSV,JSON,Path...)
Information about labeled data for regression
The meaning of the label
Annotation file of the labeled data
Collection containing every dataset element individually
Collection for a single annotation of a dataset element
Annotation file with labeling information about the dataset element
Collection to add addtional information about the dataset element
This is a property for a specific metainformation for single regressionfiles
Collection of meta data information about the dataset
Data type of the dataset elements (e.g. .WAV, .JPEG, ... )
Collection of additional meta information of the dataset
Meta data information of the dataset
Collection of different metrics
metric of the dataset
Collection about the number of dataset elements in the dataset and subsets
Number of all samples in the dataset
Number of all dataset elements in the training subset
Number of all dataset elements in the validation subset
Number of all dataset elements in the test subset
Splitratio between the sets, notate as value1:value2:value3 if all three exist, else value1:value2
Path to the dataset (e.g. local path, serverpath,...)
eindeutige globale Identifizierung der Produktinstanz unter Verwendung eines universellen Ressourcenbezeichners (URI)
unique global identification of the product instance using an universal resource identifier (URI)
Version des Datensatzes
Version of the dataset
